pageTitle: The tile template catalog (Windows Runtime apps) - Windows app development
textBeforeTable: Windows Phone 8.1: One short string of large block text (generally numerical) in the lower right corner, to the left of a single, very short line of regular text. Windows: One string of large block text (generally numerical) over a single, short line of regular text. TileSquareBlock/TileSquare150x150Block TileSquareText04/TileSquare150x150Text04 TileSquareText03/TileSquare150x150Text03 TileSquareText02/TileSquare150x150Text02 TileSquareText01/TileSquare150x150Text01 TileSquareBlock/TileSquare150x150Block Medium text-only templates Medium peek templates Medium image-only templates Medium text-only templates Medium tiles are square and contain either only an image or only text. Medium peek tiles enable you to combine images and text in an animated tile. Medium tiles   TileWide310x150IconWithBadgeAndText TileSquare150x150IconWithBadge TileSquare71x71IconWithBadge TileSquare71x71Image TileSquare310x310TextList03 TileSquare310x310TextList02 TileSquare310x310TextList01 TileSquare310x310Text09 TileSquare310x310Text08 TileSquare310x310Text07
textAfterTable: Example XML Copy  <tile> <visual> <binding template="TileSquareBlock"> <text id="1">Text Field 1 (block text)</text> <text id="2">Text Field 2</text> </binding> </visual> </tile> <tile> <visual version="2"> <binding template="TileSquare150x150Block" fallback="TileSquareBlock"> <text id="1">Text Field 1 (block text)</text> <text id="2">Text Field 2</text> </binding> </visual> </tile>   TileSquareText01/TileSquare150x150Text01 One header string in larger text on the first line; three strings of regular text on each of the next three lines. Text does not wrap. Version 1 name TileSquareText01 Version 2 and 3 name TileSquare150x150Text01 Example Example XML Copy  <tile> <visual> <binding template="TileSquareText01"> <text id="1">Text Field 1 (larger text)</text> <text id="2">Text Field 2</text> <text id="3">Text Field 3</text> <text id="4">Text Field 4</text> </binding> </visual> </tile> <tile> <visual version="2"> <binding template="TileSquare150x150Text01" fallback="TileSquareText01"> <text id="1">Text Field 1 (larger text)</text> <text id="2">Text Field 2</text> <text id="3">Text Field 3</text> <text id="4">Text Field 4</text> </binding> </visual> </tile>   TileSquareText02/TileSquare150x150Text02 One header string in larger text on the first line,
